# mmd (markdown translator)

mdt will overwritten `marked.Renderer.prototype`.

## Install

    npm install mdt --save

## Usage

```javascript
var mdt, render;

render = {
  code: "```\n" + (content.replace(/^ {4}/gm, '')) + "\n```"
};

mdt = require('mdt');

mdt(render)(markdown_source);
```
